Module fastwritinggame
Package com.fastwriting.controller

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
com.fastwriting.controller.GameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class GameController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller class for the main game interface. Handles game logic, user input validation, timer management, and level progression.
Since:
2024
Version:
3.0
Author:
[Your Name]

      private javafx.scene.control.Label feedbackLabel
      FXML label component that displays feedback messages to the user. Shows success, error, and instructional messages. Connected to the FXML file through fx:id="feedbackLabel".

    • progressBar

      private javafx.scene.control.ProgressBar progressBar
      FXML progress bar component that shows game progression visually. Updates based on current level advancement. Connected to the FXML file through fx:id="progressBar".

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL location, ResourceBundle resources)
      Initializes the controller class. This method is automatically called after the FXML file has been loaded.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      location - the location used to resolve relative paths for the root object
      resources - the resources used to localize the root object

    • initializeGame

      private void initializeGame()
      Initializes the game to its starting state. Resets level, time, and loads the first word.

    • loadNewWord

      private void loadNewWord()
      Loads a new word or phrase for the current level. Updates the display and clears the input field.

    • startTimer

      private void startTimer()
      Starts the countdown timer for the current level. The timer decreases every second and validates input when it reaches zero.

    • handleTimerTick

      private void handleTimerTick()
      Handles timer tick events. Called every second during countdown.

    • updateTimerDisplay

      private void updateTimerDisplay()
      Updates the timer display with the current remaining time. Changes styling based on remaining time.

    • updateLevelDisplay

      private void updateLevelDisplay()
      Updates the level display with current level information.

    • validateInput

      private void validateInput()
      Validates the user's input against the current word. Handles success and failure scenarios.

    • handleSuccess

      private void handleSuccess()
      Handles successful word completion. Advances to next level and adjusts difficulty.

    • handleFailure

      private void handleFailure(String message)
      Handles input failure scenarios. Stops the game and displays game over screen.
      Parameters:
      message - the failure message to display

    • endGameVoluntarily

      private void endGameVoluntarily()
      Ends the game voluntarily and shows statistics.

    • onKeyPressed

      private void onKeyPressed(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent event)
      Handles key press events on the input field. Called from FXML when a key is pressed in the input field.
      Parameters:
      event - the key event

    • onSubmitButtonClicked

      private void onSubmitButtonClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles submit button clicks. Called from FXML when the submit button is clicked.
      Parameters:
      event - the action event

      private void onRestartButtonClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles restart button clicks. Called from FXML when the restart button is clicked.

      event - the action event
